Class User

java.lang.Object
  play.db.jpa.JPABase
      play.db.jpa.GenericModel
          play.db.jpa.Model
              models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, play.db.Model
@Entity
public class User
extends play.db.jpa.Model

A chat user in the system, who can be online or off, and the maintained meta data relevant to them

See Also:
Serialized Form
